name: Marshall.D.Teach (OP09-081)
effect:
Your [On Play] effects are negated.
[Activate: Main] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Your opponent's [On Play] effects are negated until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: Kuzan
effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[On K.O.] Play up to 1 "Blackbeard Pirates" type Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your trash rested.

name: Marshall.D.Teach (ST27-005)
effect:
[Activate:Main] You may rest this Character: K.O. up to 1 Character with a cost of 3 or less.
[On K.O.] Add up to 1 black card from your trash to your hand.

name: Avalo Pizarro
effect:
[Activate:Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 1 of your [Fullalead] cards: If your Leader has the "Blackbeard Pirates" type, this Character gains +4000 power during this turn.
[On K.O.] Draw 1 card.

name: Catarina Devon
effect:
[Activate:Main] You may trash this Character: If your Leader has the "Blackbeard Pirates" type, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters -1 cost during this turn.
[On K.O.] Draw 1 card.

name: Sanjuan.Wolf
effect:
If your Leader has the "Blackbeard Pirates" type, this Character gains [Blocker] and +1 cost for every 4 cards in your trash.
(After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[On Play] Trash 1 card from your hand.

name: Van Augur (Reprint)
effect:
[Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: If your Leader has the "Blackbeard Pirates" type, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters 3 cost during this turn.
[On K.O.] Draw 1 card.

DISCLAIMER: This card is a reprint of the pre-existing card in the OP09 set. The main difference between this card and the original print is the inclusion of "EN" on the right side, by the copyright information.

name: Jesus Burgess (Reprint)
effect:

name: Laffitte (Reprint)
effect:
[Activate: Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards and this Character: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 "Blackbeard Pirates" type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
